skins.selfIntroduction: I am Ryuujou of the Sakura Empire, a seasoned warrior who has served in the First through Fourth Carrier Divisions, and participated in campaigns in the Phillipines, East Indies, Aleutian Islands, and Guadalcanal. I don't look the part...? Th-that must be because of that one incident at Iwate that stunted my growth! Milord, just you wait. I'll show you the extent of my capabilities!
skins.acquisition: Milord, I am called Ryuujou, a ranger from the Land of the Rising Sun! I shall lay down my seven lives to mete out justice in your name!
skins.login: A day off? Milord, my week only consists of Monday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and Friday!
skins.details: Milord, we cannot survive unless we fight!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Odango... these delicacies will cause my heart to waver, so... Um, I suppose I can reward myself a little.... Mmmh! So delicious!
skins.secretaryIdle2: When you're stressed out, you should go watch the fish swimming around peacefully in the aquarium. I'm not sure why, but it always calms me down.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I fight for a just cause! No matter who stands before me, I swear to give it my all!
skins.secretaryTouch: Milord, please be careful. I am just as top-heavy as Illustrious.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek!!! Oh, it wasn't Saratoga after all. However, you seem to be even more mischievous than she is.

skins.shipDescription: *yawn*... Finally, a good night's rest... Now, to pick up where I left off on that RPG... M-m-m-milord, why are you here?! I wasn't slacking off or anything, I w-w-was just... Ughh....
skins.acquisition: *yawn*... Finally, a good night's rest... Now, to pick up where I left off on that RPG... M-m-m-milord, why are you here?! I wasn't slacking off or anything, I w-w-was just... Ughh....
skins.login: *yawn*... O-one moment! I'll get myself in order!
skins.details: It's good to always be ready for battle, but this isn't... so bad either, wouldn't you agree, Milord?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I cannot believe how addictive this technological marvel of a game console can be...! B-but that's not to say it has no merits whatsoever! After all, if we could settle wars through these games, nobody would have to get hurt!
skins.secretaryIdle3: C-can we really allow foodstuffs as devilishly tempting as these deep-fried chips of potato to exist in our society?!
skins.secretaryTouch: Zzzzz... Milord?! Are we being attacked?! ...I lowered my guard and fell asleep? Forgive me for this shameful display!
